sentences.sContent: The ostensible purpose of these meetings was to gather information on financial strategies.
sentences.sCn: 这些会议声称旨在收集金融策略方面的信息。

remMethod.val: os(向上) + tens(拉) + ible → 向上拉长的 → 表面上的

trans.tranOther: seeming to be the reason for or the purpose of something, but usually hiding the real reason or purpose
